live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. A further update will be provided at 09:49 MT. Thank you for your patience.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
62361.summary: Some customers in the Kaskitayo area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
62361.title: June 11 - Calgary (Kaskitayo) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
